entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who is being spoken to by Harry. He is told to tell others that the sword is fake, and not to reveal it's the real one.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is a student who is speaking from behind the door. He orders Harry and his friends to stand back and line up against the wall, threatening to kill them if they try anything.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student who marches into the cellar with his wand held out in front of him. He seizes Griphook by the arm and drags him out.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who Apparates into the cellar, revealing himself to Harry and his friends after Ron clicks the Deluminator.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is speaking to Griphook and trying to convince him to tell others that the sword is fake.

relationships.description: Harry is speaking to Griphook, trying to convince him to tell others that the sword is fake.
Draco is threatening Harry and his friends from behind the door.
Malfoy seizes Griphook by the arm and drags him out of the cellar.
Ron clicks the Deluminator, revealing Dobby who has Apparated into the cellar.
